name: Steven Black
description: Extending and consolidating hosts files from several well-curated sources like adaway.org, mvps.org, malwaredomainlist.com, someonewhocares.org, and potentially others.

name: CAMELEON
description: CAMELEON is a free system that helps Internet users or administrators to blocks web-adverts.

name: ZeuS Tracker
description: ZeuS Tracker offers various IP- and domain-blocklists that contains known ZeuS Command&Control server (C&C) assocaited with the ZeuS crimeware.

name: Disconnect (Tracking)
description: Free yourself from unwanted tracking. Enjoy a faster, safer internet.

name: Disconnect (Ads)
description: Free yourself from unwanted tracking. Enjoy a faster, safer internet.

name: hpHosts (ATS)
description: hpHosts is a community managed and maintained hosts file that allows an additional layer of protection against access to ad, tracking and malicious websites.

name: NoCoin
description: Block lists to prevent JavaScript miners.

name: fakenews
description: An in-progress collection of fake news outlets. Currently blocking 669 untrustworthy sites.

name: Google SafeSearch
description: Block explicit images, videos, and websites from Google Search results.

name: Youtube Restricted Mode
description: Restricted Mode can help hide videos with potentially mature content. No filter is 100% accurate, but it should help you avoid most of this type of content.

name: Bing SafeSearch
description: Filter out adult text, images, and videos from your search results.
